personal_origin.context: Grandfathers funeral - sad day, no happy birthday

timeline.2020s_return: Returned to RuneScape a couple months before
timeline.catalyst_day: Bored in Grand Exchange - sardonic comment about RH
timeline.obsession_begins: Whats the Riemann Hypothesis? - research begins

mathematical_significance.significance: April 26th - day 26 is not prime, month 4 is not prime, but 26/φ ≈ 16.07 and 4/φ ≈ 2.47

runeScape_introduction.description: First RuneScape experience - grandfathers funeral, 14th birthday
runeScape_introduction.significance: Distraction from grief, beginning of digital journey

grand_exchange_catalyst.description: Sardonic comment about Riemann Hypothesis in Grand Exchange
grand_exchange_catalyst.significance: Moment of mathematical awakening - curiosity sparked

obsession_beginning.description: Whats the RH? - research and obsession begins
obsession_beginning.significance: Transformation from gaming to mathematical research

mathematical_journey.description: Years of research leading to Wallace Transformation framework
